author: barnabasbusa
content: We had genesis 4h ago on fusaka-devnet-4. Its a very large network, so any changes on it will take a while to roll out. Please keep an eye on it, and let us know if you need some new image rolled out. Watchtower is disabled on it.

author: barnabasbusa
content: The usual links are available under https://fusaka-devnet-4.ethpandaops.io

author: barnabasbusa
content:
We also don't have dns names setup for each node, as this would exceed the limitations of cloudflare, We have dns setup for all nodes -1, -2, -3 ending. Otherwise if you want to ssh into a host you can do it directly using it's [ip address](https://github.com/ethpandaops/fusaka-devnets/blob/master/ansible/inventories/devnet-4/inventory.ini).

Also we now use full/super prefix in the names, so host names are:  `teku-besu-full-1`

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Fulu will be activated approx a day from now. 

We have constant tx and blob spamming (in public mempool)

author: sunnysidedj_42398
content: Sunnyside Labs is delighted to be participating in fusaka-devnet-4, running around 400 fullnodes (229 Lighthouse-Geth & 168 Prysm-Geth). We're also excited to welcome <@&975128594101702746> to the devnet - we'll be operating additional nodes on their behalf as part of this collaboration (potentially as non-validator nodes). Alongside EthPandaOps, we'll also be actively analyzing and debugging throughout the run. Looking forward to such a mega-devnet!!
